meanings.definition: An ancient runic alphabet used by the Anglo-Saxons.
meanings.sent1: The futhorc was a set of symbols used for writing in the past.
meanings.sent2: Scholars study the futhorc to understand ancient texts.
meanings.sent3: The futhorc letters looked like mysterious drawings to the children.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a futhorc of thoughts, each symbolizing a different idea.
meanings.sent5: The futhorc carved on the stone tablet seemed to whisper secrets of the past.

meanings.definition: The name of the runic alphabet itself.
meanings.sent1: Learning to write in futhorc was a challenge for the students.
meanings.sent2: The word 'futhorc' refers to the runic alphabet used by the Anglo-Saxons.
meanings.sent3: The teacher joked that 'futhorc' sounded like a magical spell.
meanings.sent4: In her dreams, the futhorc danced around her, spelling out cryptic messages.
meanings.sent5: The futhorc on the page seemed to come alive, telling stories of ancient times.
